com.leantegra.wibeat.sdk.monitoring.distance

Class DefaultDistanceCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.leantegra.wibeat.sdk.monitoring.distance.DefaultDistanceCalculator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DistanceCalculator

    public class DefaultDistanceCalculator
extends Object
implements DistanceCalculator
    Calculate the distance between the Android device and WiBeat based on the measured RSSI value and a TX power calibration value at 1 meter.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    See Also:
    DistanceCalculator

      Construct a calculator with a custom attenuation coefficient.
